message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a fair $400000 which is 40% of the total. Keep in mind that if we go to the next round, inflation will reduce the value of the money. This is a reasonable first offer that benefits us both.
I think a 55/45 split is a fair starting point. I'm willing to negotiate further, but I believe this is a good starting point for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need to account for the higher inflation rate that affects me (20% per round) compared to your 10% per round. This 52/48 split is more fair considering our different inflation impacts. If we continue to the next round, we both lose more value, so I hope you'll accept this reasonable compromise.
